mapper.insert: insert into orderInfo (orderId , userId , proCode , address , orderPrice , deliveryInfo) values (#{orderId},#{userId},#{proCode},#{address},#{orderPrice},#{deliveryInfo})
mapper.select: select orderId , user.userId , product.proCode , orderStock , product.proPrice As orderPrice from portfolio.orderInfo LEFT JOIN portfolio.user ON user.userId = orderinfo.userId LEFT JOIN portfolio.product ON product.proCode = orderInfo.proCode where user.userId = #{userId};
